```{r}

proteins_of_interest <- c("interleukin", "TGFB", "TNFA")
tst <- gget$search(proteins_of_interest, "homo_sapiens")
tst %<>% filter(biotype == "protein_coding")
# TGFB
id <- tst %>% filter(gene_name == "TGFB1") %>% pull(ensembl_id)
id
tgfb <- gget$seq(id, translate=TRUE)

```
